Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Michael C Sachs. Author, maintainer.

  • Erin E Gabriel. Author.

  • Morten Overgaard. Contributor.
    Corrected variance calculation

  • Thomas A Gerds. Contributor.
    Fast computation of leave one out cumulative incidence

  • Terry Therneau. Contributor.
    Restricted mean computation

Citation

Source: inst/CITATION
